original_text: She weepeth sore in the night, and her tears are on her cheeks: among all her lovers she hath none to comfort her: all her friends have dealt treacherously with her, they are become her enemies.
korean_text: 밤에는 슬피 우니 눈물이 뺨에 흐름이여 사랑하던 자들 중에 그에게 위로하는 자가 없고 친구들도 다 배반하여 원수들이 되었도다

sentences.original_text: She weepeth sore in the night
and her tears are on her cheeks
among all her lovers she hath none to comfort her
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀의 모든 연인들 중에 그녀를 위로할 자가 없으며

sentences.original_text: all her friends have dealt treacherously with her
